Sorry.... I hate when they end up being nothing :o(  He is really good at i=
dentifying languages, even though he is a "non-believer"  he does help me o=
ut from time to time.  So if you ever had another odd one- he said send it =
over..   

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Wiliam Clarke 
  To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, April 25, 2008 8:45 AM
  Subject: Re:=
 [EVP-ITC] Does anybody speak spanish?


  Ok well thank u!  I guess that s=
olves that.

  Cheri Esperon <cesperon@...> wrote: 

    My Dh is flu=
ent in Spanish & speaks several other languages.. I had him listen and he s=
aid it sounds like the 2nd half of an English word..


      ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
      From: Wiliam Clarke 
      To: Posted Messages ; rtsc=
 Posred messages 
      Sent: Friday, April 25, 2008 8:24 AM
      Subject:=
 [EVP-ITC] Does anybody speak spanish?


      My file helpmefindhim, I can=
't understand what is said after my question.  Does anybody speak Spanish i=
n these forums?  Please let me know what it means, if it means anything.

 =
     Thanks

      W. Rees
